# Load Packages
```{r load packages}
library("ggplot2")
```

# Load in data
```{r load-Data}
data <- read.csv("Data/Dataset_S1.txt")
# View Data
head(data)
```
# Plot Data
```{r plot-GCData}
#rename GC
colnames(data)[12] <- "percent.GC"
#bin data into 5
data$GC.binned <- cut(data$percent.GC, 5)
#plot
ggplot(data) + geom_bar(aes(x = GC.binned))
```
